books.name: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A science fiction epic set in a distant future where noble houses vie for control of the desert planet Arrakis, the only known source of the valuable spice melange.

books.name: Foundation
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: The first book in the Foundation series, depicting the fall of the Galactic Empire and the efforts to shorten the ensuing dark age.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother, where individuality and freedom of thought are suppressed.

books.name: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A satirical novel depicting a futuristic world where society is controlled through genetic engineering, psychological conditioning, and the use of mood-altering drugs.

books.name: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a future society where books are outlawed and 'firemen' burn any that are found.

books.name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comedic science fiction series following the misadventures of Arthur Dent, a human who is one of the last surviving members of Earth, and his alien friend Ford Prefect.

books.name: Neuromancer
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: A cyberpunk novel set in a future where cyberspace, artificial intelligence, and multinational corporations play central roles in society.

books.name: Ender's Game
books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.description: A science fiction novel following the story of Ender Wiggin, a young boy who is recruited by the military to attend Battle School and train to fight against an alien species known as the Formics.

books.name: The War of the Worlds
books.author: H.G. Wells
books.description: A classic science fiction novel depicting an invasion of Earth by Martians and the ensuing struggle for survival.

books.name: Snow Crash
books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: A cyberpunk novel set in a future America where the government has largely collapsed, and the Mafia controls most territories, with the main character, Hiro Protagonist, attempting to uncover a new drug called Snow Crash.
